text: Human intelligence may not be the best trick nature has to offer.
author: Bryant H. McGill

text: I consider it useless and tedious to represent what exists, because nothing that exists satisfies me. Nature is ugly, and I prefer the monsters of my fancy to what is positively trivial.
author: Charles Baudelaire

text: We all dream. We dream vividly, depending on our nature. Our existence is beyond our explanation, whether we believe in God or we have religion or we're atheist.
author: Anthony Hopkins

text: To find a Buddha all you have to do is see your nature.
author: Bodhidharma

text: Art is contemplation. It is the pleasure of the mind which searches into nature and which there divines the spirit of which nature herself is animated.
author: Auguste Rodin
